title: Land for Rent in Kesbewa ( Facing Horana - Colombo Main Road )
details:
- Land facing Horana - Colombo (120 root) main road
- 80 perches ( can give whole land or less )
- 1.8 km away from the Kesbewa town towards to Polgasowita Junction.
- 2.5 km for southern highway
- Suitable for long term business, warehouse
